definition: cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
to take the blame/to be a scapegoat/to carry the can

sentences.english: Analysis and comment are made on the floating cylinder sleeve method known in late years.
sentences.chinese: 對近幾年來發表的浮動缸套測量法進行了分析和評述。

sentences.english: And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的水電費甚至足以令最愛缸浴的人改爲淋浴。

sentences.english: This aquarium tank from the ice structure, ornamental fish frozen in the inside.
sentences.chinese: 這種水族缸由冰塊構成，觀賞魚被冷凍在了裏面。

sentences.english: The displacer piston now moves, shunting the gas to the cold end of the cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 活塞的置換現在動作，調氣，以冷戰結束缸。

sentences.english: This 4-seat sedan is powered by a 6.0-litre V12 behemoth.
sentences.chinese: 這輛四座轎車的發動機是恐怖的6升V字型12缸。

sentences.english: The LP casing blade of unit 3 in Tuoketuo Power Plant is broken after only three months operation.
sentences.chinese: 託電3號機組低壓缸葉片運行僅3個月就發生了斷裂。

sentences.english: The casting technique of cylinder liner used for G32 model heavy diesel engine was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹G32重型柴油機合金灰鑄鐵缸套的生產技術。

sentences.english: Paracheirodon simulans and Nematobrycon paimeri "black" are the main ornamental fishes in this tank.
sentences.chinese: 綠蓮燈和黑帝王燈是此缸中主要的觀賞魚。

sentences.english: If I am not mistaken, BMW used to be famous for its 6-cylinder engine.
sentences.chinese: 如果我沒弄錯的話，寶馬以前的6缸引擎很出名。

sentences.english: This is a 5 cylinder radial engine that has the same displacement as the V-twin below.
sentences.chinese: 這是5缸發動機徑向具有相同位移的V型雙如下。

sentences.english: The reheated steam is further expanded in the IP and LP cylinders, before passing into the condenser.
sentences.chinese: 再熱蒸汽在進入凝汽器之前在中低壓缸中進一步膨脹。

sentences.english: The photo of the mud pump 1iner has taken we11.
sentences.chinese: 泥漿泵缸套這張照片拍得好。

sentences.english: Three children are playing in the garden by a colorful porcelain cistern planted with pink lotuses.
sentences.chinese: 三名童子在庭中戲水船，彩瓷缸開放著粉色的荷花。
鑲嵌式和長管式水族缸。

sentences.english: The diamond ring was soused into the fishbowl of water.
sentences.chinese: 那隻鑽戒被扔進了養魚缸的水裏。

sentences.english: There is so little water left in the jar that we must carry some more.
sentences.chinese: 缸裏剩下的水這麼少，我們必須再去挑一些。

definition: jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
